TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationDeltaEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationDeltaEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationDeltaEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含有关操作位置更改的数据。The class contains data about changes in the position of a manipulation. 属性包含自上次发生事件后发生的更改。 The property contains the changes that occurred since the last event occurred. 属性包含当前操作发生的全部更改。The property contains the total changes that occurred for the current manipulation. 您可以使用这些属性之一来转换操作的对象。You use one of those properties to transform the manipulated object. 可以通过调用方法来结束操作, 也可以通过调用方法强制操作进入惯性。You can end a manipulation by calling the method or force the manipulation into inertia by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例使用属性移动、调整大小和旋转。The example uses the property to move, resize, and rotate a . 该示例还检查是否发生了惯性期间发生的事件, 以及矩形是否正在触及窗口的边缘。The example also checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果这些事例为 true, 则应用程序将停止操作以防止矩形离开应用程序的可见区域。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 本示例是演练中[更大示例的一部分:正在创建您的第](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)一个 Touch 应用程序。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationdelta)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationdelta)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Cancels the manipulation.

returns.span: 如果成功取消操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该方法成功, 则默认情况下会将以前的触摸事件作为鼠标按下或鼠标移动事件发送到元素, 且将来操作事件不会发生。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch events as mouse down or mouse move events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur. 如果在惯性期间发生事件, 则无法将触摸升级到鼠标事件。Touch cannot be promoted to mouse events if the event occurs during inertia.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Complete() cil managed

summary.span: 完成操作而不发生惯性。

span.span: Completes the manipulation without inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以调用方法来结束操作。You can call the method to end the manipulation. 例如, 当对象到达窗口边缘时, 您可以调用来阻止对象离开屏幕。For example, when an object reaches the edge of a window, you can call to prevent the object from going off the screen. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例将检查是否发生了惯性期间发生的事件, 以及该矩形是否正在触及窗口的边缘。The example checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果这些事例为 true, 则应用程序将停止操作以防止矩形离开应用程序的可见区域。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 本示例是演练中[更大示例的一部分:正在创建您的第](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)一个 Touch 应用程序。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 事件是否在惯性期间发生。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the event occurs during inertia.

value.span: 如果在惯性运动期间发生 事件，则为 ；如果在用户接触 过程中发生该事件，则为 。

span.span: if the event occurs during inertia; if the event occurs while the user has contact with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来确定事件是在惯性期间发生, 还是在用户与接收事件的元素联系时才发生。You can use this method to determine whether the event occurs during inertia or while the user has contact with the element that receives the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例将检查是否发生了惯性期间发生的事件, 以及该矩形是否正在触及窗口的边缘。The example checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果这些事例为 true, 则应用程序将停止操作以防止矩形离开应用程序的可见区域。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 本示例是演练中[更大示例的一部分:正在创建您的第](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)一个 Touch 应用程序。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReportBoundaryFeedback(class System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta unusedManipulation) cil managed

param.name: unusedManipulation
param.span: 表示移动出边界的操作部分。

span.span: The portion of the manipulation that represents moving beyond the boundary.

summary.span: 指明该操作已经超出了一定界限。

span.span: Specifies that the manipulation has gone beyond certain boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法指示元素已移动到超出特定边界。Use the method to indicate that an element has moved beyond a certain boundary. 例如, 如果用户将元素移动到的边界之外, 则可以调用此方法来向窗口报告该元素。For example, if a user moves an element outside of the bounds of a , you can call this method to report that to the window. 调用时, 将发生事件。When you call , the event occurs. 默认情况下, 订阅事件以便向用户提供已达到边界的视觉反馈。By default, the subscribes to the event to provide visual feedback to the user that a boundary has been reached. 您可以订阅以实现自定义行为。You can subscribe to to implement custom behavior. ## Examples 下面的示例演示当用户将元素移到其容器的边缘上时调用方法的事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event that calls the method when the user moves the element over the edge of its container. 若要测试此示例, 请按照[演练:创建第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)程序, 并将步骤5中的代码替换为此代码。To test this example, follow the steps in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md) and replace the code in step 5 with this code. [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ReportBoundaryFeedback](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.cs#reportboundaryfeedback)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ReportBoundaryFeedback](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.vb#reportboundaryfeedback)]

span.span: is .
